title: tpaxmatop
author: tpaxmatop
content: Link to the project - https://tradehive.live/Created the project which allows you to find the perfect crypto trading opportunities. It analyzes all coins (USDT) in real-time: trades, charts, depth.¬†Key Features:Exchanges: Binance Spot/Futures, Bybit Spot/Futures. (Will add more exchanges in the future)Orderbook screener:: Track limit orders (depth of market) in real-time for each coin in interactive table. Fast switching between coins and limit orders.https://i.ibb.co/7Gzknrh/orderbook.jpgOrder book chart: Displays historical limit orders as a heatmap for all coins which exist in selected exchange. Allow identify horizontal levels (support and resistance). You can open it fast from order book screener by clicking on candles or heatmap cell.https://i.ibb.co/qyLm5Xb/order-book-chart.jpgTrend screener: Continuously analyze a huge amount of data and returns a list of coins in the form of candlestick charts according to the selected signal in real-time: Volatility, Correlation to BTC, Unusual trades, Unusual volume, Top gainers/losers, Liquidationshttps://i.ibb.co/tX5zr4y/trend-screener2.jpgNotifications: get notifications in real-time using flexible alert construction form.https://i.ibb.co/S57DTd8/alerts.jpgAdvanced Filters: Customize your search with a wide range of filters, including market capitalization, volume, price, and technical indicators. Find the hidden gems that meet your criteria effortlessly.Watchlist: You can build your own watchlist which will be categorized by exchanges.There are much more features, so if you are interested in you can review them in our documentation There is trial version for 3 days P.S: Sorry, I cannot upload images here or just did not figure out how to do it))

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: To post images you need to be a copper member, it's really cheap, it's just in place so evil newbies won't be able to spam or post beautiful images just to attract investors for their scam ICOs. Here you can check this link :https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteOr you can pay me 1 BTC and I will quote you like this : Quote from: tpaxmatop on September 27, 2023, 08:00:22 AMLink to the project - https://tradehive.live/Created the project which allows you to find the perfect crypto trading opportunities. It analyzes all coins (USDT) in real-time: trades, charts, depth.¬†Key Features:Exchanges: Binance Spot/Futures, Bybit Spot/Futures. (Will add more exchanges in the future)Orderbook screener:: Track limit orders (depth of market) in real-time for each coin in interactive table. Fast switching between coins and limit orders.Order book chart: Displays historical limit orders as a heatmap for all coins which exist in selected exchange. Allow identify horizontal levels (support and resistance). You can open it fast from order book screener by clicking on candles or heatmap cell.Trend screener: Continuously analyze a huge amount of data and returns a list of coins in the form of candlestick charts according to the selected signal in real-time: Volatility, Correlation to BTC, Unusual trades, Unusual volume, Top gainers/losers, LiquidationsNotifications: get notifications in real-time using flexible alert construction form.Advanced Filters: Customize your search with a wide range of filters, including market capitalization, volume, price, and technical indicators. Find the hidden gems that meet your criteria effortlessly.Watchlist: You can build your own watchlist which will be categorized by exchanges.There are much more features, so if you are interested in you can review them in our documentation There is trial version for 3 days P.S: Sorry, I cannot upload images here or just did not figure out how to do it))Alright, you got away for free this time.üòâ Jokes aside, you can buy copper membership, it also allows you to post without waiting few minutes.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Can't tell if it's a nice tool or not. I tried signing up, but it seems the 3-day trial period will only be granted to someone who filling in their credit card details or first makes payment, which I am not willing to do until I know how good the tool is.Why not grant the users 3 trial days to explore, and then they choose whether to pay or not?Quote from: tpaxmatop on September 27, 2023, 08:00:22 AMP.S: Sorry, I cannot upload images here or just did not figure out how to do it)You have more than enough merit. All you need is at least 28 activity points, and you will rank up to Jr member rank to be able to post images.

comments.author: tpaxmatop
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on September 28, 2023, 10:36:09 PMCan't tell if it's a nice tool or not. I tried signing up, but it seems the 3-day trial period will only be granted to someone who filling in their credit card details or first makes payment, which I am not willing to do until I know how good the tool is.Why not grant the users 3 trial days to explore, and then they choose whether to pay or not?You don't need fill your credit card details to get trial version. You need just confirm your email address (activation link was sent to the email which was provided in registration step) and after that on the premium page just click "activate trial version".1. Activate email address, here you can resent activation link to your email - https://tradehive.live/#/app/account#account 2. Select Trial version and click "activate" button - https://tradehive.live/#/app/checkout

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: tpaxmatop on September 28, 2023, 11:13:47 AMThanks to you, the post looks much more presentable with images)I sent bitcoin by mail in the envelope, it should come soon¬† Just don't let the mailman know you have Bitcoin in the envelope¬† , logfiles is right you just have to increase your activity and you'll reach the next rank, next time use the official Bitcointalk image uploader https://www.talkimg.com/ for a much clearer image or better create a Youtube channel and create a video of dashboard and activity for new users to better understand how it works.Better create a new announcement once you can upload images, just don't forget to lock this thread if you create a new announcement.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I browsed the site. The site seems really interesting. It is good that there is a trial version for three days for the user to experience how good the system is. Also, the $12.5 monthly subscription is not much if the results are good. But it is not clear whether the price includes all features or whether there are various plans.You mentioned in oP that the supported exchanges are Binance Spot/Futures, Bybit Spot/Futures, it would be beneficial to add more exchanges in the future because these exchanges require KYC and there will be a lot of users who prefer to using No-KYC exchanges.

comments.author: tpaxmatop
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on September 29, 2023, 08:39:28 PMI browsed the site. The site seems really interesting. It is good that there is a trial version for three days for the user to experience how good the system is. Also, the $12.5 monthly subscription is not much if the results are good. But it is not clear whether the price includes all features or whether there are various plans.You mentioned in oP that the supported exchanges are Binance Spot/Futures, Bybit Spot/Futures, it would be beneficial to add more exchanges in the future because these exchanges require KYC and there will be a lot of users who prefer to using No-KYC exchanges.Thank you for your feedback!I am planning to add at least TOP 5 exchanges in the future. Tt the start, so far I have stopped at only 2 exchanges to assess the load on the system - streaming real-time data from 1k+ coins is super expensive pleasure.As I remember ByBit is non-KYC exchange

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: tpaxmatop on September 30, 2023, 09:46:04 AMAs I remember ByBit is non-KYC exchangeUnfortunately not anymore, they are gradually implementing KYC policy, as per this announcement identity verification at least level 1 is now mandatory for all Bybit products and services starting May 8, 2023.QuoteWhich products or services on Bybit require compulsory individual identity verification?Starting from 8 May, 2023, Identity Verification of at least Lv.1 is mandatory for all Bybit products and services. Existing users that have not completed Identity Verification as of 8 May, 2023 will only be allowed to close existing open positions or orders, return loans, or make withdrawals. Any new trading activities will be restricted. Once the Identity Verification is completed, existing users can continue to use Bybit products and services.For more information, please refer to the benefits of different KYC levels.https://www.bybit.com/en-US/help-center/s/article/Individual-KYC-FAQhttps://www.bybit.com/en-US/help-center/s/article/Benefits-of-Different-KYC-Levels

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: @tpaxmatop, I made a test payment using crypto (Bitcoin) the transaction that has not yet confirmed but then the page which contains the payment information refreshed to this There is no page showing the incoming transaction.Also, I received an email in Russian. I am still confused because it was just one transaction to one address, I was providedQuote–ó–¥pa–≤c—Ç–≤y–π—Çe!B–∏–¥–∏–º –±o–ª—å—àoe –∫o–ª-–≤o –øo–ø—ã—Ço–∫ o–ø–ªa—Ç—ã TradeHive. Bo–∑–ºo–∂–Ωo Ba–º –Ωy–∂–Ωa –øo–ºo—â—å - o–ø–∏—à–∏—Çe –øpo–±–ªe–ºy –∏ —è –øoc—Çapa—éc—å –øo–ºo—á—å.TransaltionQuoteHello!We see a large number of attempts to pay TradeHive. Perhaps you need help - describe the problem and I will try to help.

comments.author: tpaxmatop
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on October 02, 2023, 03:41:02 PM@tpaxmatop, I made a test payment using crypto (Bitcoin) the transaction that has not yet confirmed but then the page which contains the payment information refreshed to this https://talkimg.com/images/2023/10/02/Ph04o.pngThere is no page showing the incoming transaction.Also, I received an email in Russian. I am still confused because it was just one transaction to one address, I was providedQuote–ó–¥pa–≤c—Ç–≤y–π—Çe!B–∏–¥–∏–º –±o–ª—å—àoe –∫o–ª-–≤o –øo–ø—ã—Ço–∫ o–ø–ªa—Ç—ã TradeHive. Bo–∑–ºo–∂–Ωo Ba–º –Ωy–∂–Ωa –øo–ºo—â—å - o–ø–∏—à–∏—Çe –øpo–±–ªe–ºy –∏ —è –øoc—Çapa—éc—å –øo–ºo—á—å.TransaltionQuoteHello!We see a large number of attempts to pay TradeHive. Perhaps you need help - describe the problem and I will try to help.For the first time see such error, but unfortunately it is not under our control - it is coinbase issue. Will try to figure out why it happened, but payments before with coinbase were successful.The audience in the project is 80% from Ukraine/Russia, so I translated message in Russian - my fault  At the start of the project, I try to help users understand how payment works, because someone needs help with this, so sometimes I am contacting them by email.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: tpaxmatop on October 03, 2023, 04:54:16 AMFor the first time see such error, but unfortunately it is not under our control - it is coinbase issue. Will try to figure out why it happened, but payments before with coinbase were successful.I made payment directly from my crypto wallet, so I also didn't understand why the coinbase Commerce page was still displaced in the background but the good news is when the Bitcoin transaction got confirmed later on, the premium service was activatedMaybe under account, you can add something to track payments including transaction ID for crypto or something like payment history.Quote from: tpaxmatop on October 03, 2023, 04:54:16 AMThe audience in the project is 80% from Ukraine/Russia, so I translated message in Russian - my fault  At the start of the project, I try to help users understand how payment works, because someone needs help with this, so sometimes I am contacting them by email.It's alright. All good now.

comments.author: tpaxmatop
comments.body: Hello fellow traders,It's been an incredible journey since the launch of the TradeHive project three months ago, and I'm thrilled to share the latest updates with you. The project has not only been successful but continues to evolve, with over 5,000 active crypto traders now benefiting from it.Here are some of the key developments over the past few months:Enhanced Order Book Heatmap:The Order Book Heatmap feature has undergone significant improvements, becoming faster and more functional than ever before.New screener "Coins" - TW alternative with more functions:Introducing a brand-new tool called "Coins," providing a comprehensive list of ALL coins with selected metrics for each (volume, correlation to BTC, volatility, etc.) over user-defined time intervals ranging from 5 minutes to 24 hours. The Coins tool also automatically identifies support and resistance levels across all timeframes.Email and Telegram Notifications:Stay informed in real-time with new features like email and Telegram notifications for price crossings and new limit orders.Expanded Functionality:A plethora of new settings and tools have been added, including a Trend Screener and Order Book Screener, offering even more ways to analyze and act on market trends.Server Optimization:Behind the scenes, we've optimized the server infrastructure, resulting in a significantly improved overall service speed.TradeHive offers cost-effective subscription at just $12.5 per month. This low cost is intentional ‚Äì my goal is to make our service accessible to traders of all levels.For any inquiries or if you simply want to connect, feel free to reach out to me on Telegram: https://t.me/dmitrijslvYoutube channel about the project - https://www.youtube.com/@TradehiveLiveLink to the project - tradehive.live

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Hey OP, glad to see you are succeeding in your work, may I use your link in my sig space for 24 hours? I like to support startups. I don't ask for anything in return though. üòâ
